body: As I understand it, we explicitly only enable rubocop. There are more, yes, and we can consider adding them in the future. Looking at the docs you linked, I see that the exclude pattern is already the default one for CC so I would prefer to remove them to be in sync with what CC thinks best. But I don't have hard feelings about this.
